thread.section_title: PRTG Network Monitor Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von PRTG Network Monitor | paessler.com
thread.title: Stephan Wippich
thread.title_full: PRTG Network Monitor bewertet von Stephan Wippich

author: Stephan Wippich
title: Stephan Wippich
text:
I've been using PRTG at our company for the past 3 years. Never have I used anything as simple and easy to use as PRTG. Has everything you need for a monitoring system.
Paessler also gives great support when needed.
I recommend anyone to use PRTG!
